name: Dash and Bash!
description:
You hate to see it. Alarm didn't go off in the morning. You have to rush to school. No time to even put bread in your mouth; you're that worried. But there's just one problem standing between you and making it on time: there’s a bunch of thugs trying to mug you on the way to school! You’re no slouch though and won’t take their advances lying down. Using your trusty bat, send your assailants flying into each other and off the walls, and beat the bell!

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim Bat

Left Click/Space - Swing Bat

Escape - Quit Game

First time trying out Godot! It's technically supposed to be a sequel to/inspired by Dodge the Creeps, but the design is super overhauled lol. I mean, you do still dodge them :P

I had to make literally EVERYTHING myself for this one, give or take, it was crazy @.@
